Articles.Content:
This rover had been on duna since 1.7. 

Took a peek at it yesterday in 1.9.1 and noticed something odd:

I tried to edit the save file but only managed to tilt it 30º. 

I assumed the rotation values are in radians in the save file... 

I'm on mac 10.13, steam, 1.9.1 with a few mods, but none that I know of that fiddle with this part...

Edited April 22, 2020 by Hangdog
details

Try making an identical rover but with the rovemate the right way round and launching that, then copy all the parts references for that new rover in the save file and paste them over the broken one. Note- backup your save file first!
